org.sbml.jsbml.ext.layout.CurveSegment

  • Packages that use CurveSegment 
    Package Description
    org.sbml.jsbml.ext.layout
    Provides classes for the Layout package.

    • Uses of CurveSegment in org.sbml.jsbml.ext.layout

      Subclasses of CurveSegment in org.sbml.jsbml.ext.layout 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CubicBezier
      In order to be able to represent smooth curves the Layout package defines the class CubicBezier.
      class  LineSegment
      The LineSegment class consists of the mandatory attribute xsi:type and two child elements of type Point.

      Method parameters in org.sbml.jsbml.ext.layout with type arguments of type CurveSegment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Curve.setListOfCurveSegments(ListOf<CurveSegment> listOfCurveSegments)
      The listOfCurveSegments element contains arbitrary number of cuve segments that can be either of type LineSegment or of type CubicBezier.
